subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Martin was devastated when he made a bizarre play that almost ended the Blue Jays’ season. Then, during an unfathomable seventh inning, he cheered his teammates toward winning Toronto’s American League division series.
snippet: Martin was devastated when he made a bizarre play that almost ended the Blue Jays’ season. Then, during an unfathomable seventh inning, he cheered his teammates toward winning Toronto’s American League division series.
